title: San Francisco; Hollywood; Beverly Hills
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/United States - Description and travel
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Leisure
description: Hang ten at Huntington Beach or take a ski run at Big Bear. Discover history preserved in landmarks and revel in world renowned performing arts. See the vast variety of California's lifestyle cities. Explore the hills and valleys of San Francisco: ride a trolley car, explore the Barbary Coast, enjoy museums, opera, symphony and distinguished cuisine on Fisherman's Wharf. Travel to the bustling mega-tropolis Los Angeles and tour the infamous Beverly Hills and Hollywood, home to the rich and famous. Marvel at the sites and sounds of southern California - at the regions natural beauty from beaches to desert to snow-capped mountains. All without leaving your own lounge chair!
